actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act to extend the Wetlands Loan Act" to provide for the expansion of the Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Connecticut Coastal Protection Act of 1990 - Removes a limitation on the amount authorized to be appropriated for the Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands in Connecticut for the expansion of the Refuge.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act entitled "An Act to extend the Wetlands Loan Act" to provide for the expansion of the Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge.
